articles.author: Jonathan Gorrie
articles.title: Transfer news LIVE! Rice close to Arsenal; Chelsea in fresh £64m bid - Evening Standard
articles.description: Follow all the latest transfer news, rumours and gossip
articles.content: The transfer window is in full swing with all of Arsenal, Chelsea and Tottenham playing key roles. The Gunners continue to chase both Declan Rice, Kai Havertz and Jurrien Timber as Mikel Arteta aims … [+4599 chars]
